english.segment1: Just one last cigarette and fly. Coincidences made sorrow rule over your soul. I'm standing with my wings around you. I cry
english.segment2: So try to show you're a man. You're nobody's toy. There is nothing that separates a man from a boy
english.segment3: Thought so dark you got lost in there. Lost your way home and now it's getting late. I long to greet you when you come home. But don't you leave earth in this state
english.segment4: No don't you leave earth in this state. I'm the soft whisper of peace in your ear. As all of this creates. No night vision in this forest of darkness. And I feel what you feel inside. And as your skin got burned mine did too when they lied
english.segment5: And you know I'm pulling you closer
